content: This dish is absolutely delicious, I couldn't get enough!
I made this for dinner last night and my family loved it!
The flavors in this recipe are so well-balanced, it's a new favorite!
I added a pinch of extra spice and it turned out perfectly!
Such a simple recipe but so satisfying, will definitely make again.
I'm not usually a fan of [ingredient], but it worked so well in this dish!
This recipe was a hit at my dinner party, everyone was asking for the recipe!
I've made this multiple times now, it's become a weekly staple in my household.
